ip access-list extended SSH-Telnet
 permit tcp 192.168.35.0 255.255.255.0 172.16.101.0 255.255.254.0 eq 22
 permit tcp 192.168.35.0 255.255.255.0 172.16.101.0 255.255.254.0 eq telnet
 permit tcp 192.168.35.0 255.255.255.0 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 eq telnet
 permit tcp 192.168.35.0 255.255.255.0 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 eq 22
 permit tcp 192.168.20.132 255.255.255.0 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0
 permit tcp 192.168.20.132 255.255.255.0 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 eq 22
 permit tcp 192.168.20.132 255.255.255.0 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 eq telnet
 permit tcp 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 eq 22
 permit tcp 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 eq telnet
 permit tcp 192.168.20.171 255.255.255.0 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 eq 22
 permit tcp 192.168.20.171 255.255.255.0 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 eq telnet
 deny   tcp any 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 eq 22
 deny   tcp any 172.16.100.0 255.255.254.0 eq telnet
 |
 interface gig 0/9
 ip access-group SSH-Telnet
 
 interface gig 0/10 
 ip access-group SSH-Telnet
